description: This file defines the main layout component for a React application using React Router, Redux, and custom components for navigation, sidebar, and date range selection. It manages the structure and UI elements of the root layout including top navigation, sidebar toggle, and main content area.

classes.name: GlobalDateSelector
classes.description: A React component providing a date range picker that dispatches selected ranges to Redux store.

classes.name: RootLayout
classes.description: Main layout React component setting up navigation, sidebar, and content area of the app.

methods.name: GlobalDateSelector
methods.description: Handles rendering of the date range picker and dispatches updates to Redux store.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Handles the overall page layout with navigation, sidebar toggle, and outlet for nested routes.
